_comment: Single source of truth for What's New dialog and changelog. Add new releases at the top.

releases.title: Enhanced Reliability
releases.description: Improved Google Drive integration with automatic retry logic for better stability.
features: Automatic retry logic for Google Drive API - handles temporary failures gracefully
Configurable credentials path for flexible deployment configurations
More resilient file operations with exponential backoff
releases.tagline: More reliable, fewer interruptions.

releases.title: Rotating Hint Bar
releases.description: Dashboard now shows rotating tips to help you discover features you might have missed.
features: Rotating hint bar displays feature discovery tips on the dashboard
Smart rotation keeps hints fresh and relevant
Helpful tips for navigating FOSSAPP's powerful features
releases.tagline: Discover features you didn't know existed.

releases.title: Symbol DWG Generation
releases.description: Generate professional AutoCAD DWG symbols directly from product data using AI.
features: AI-powered DWG generation - converts symbol specs to AutoCAD drawings
Built-in DWG viewer - preview generated symbols in your browser
Metric units by default - all drawings set to millimeters automatically
Smart retry with model escalation - Sonnet first, Opus for corrections
Download DWG and PNG files instantly
releases.tagline: From product data to AutoCAD symbols in seconds.

releases.title: Settings Sync & Filter UX
releases.description: Your preferences now sync across devices and filter categories are more compact.
features: Cross-device settings sync - theme, sidebar state, and search history follow you
Filter categories start collapsed for a cleaner interface
More compact collapsed filter categories
Fixed infinite render loop in settings
releases.tagline: Your preferences, everywhere you work.

releases.title: Cleaner Icons
releases.description: Replaced emojis with professional Lucide icons throughout the app.
features: Professional Lucide icons replace emojis across the interface
Consistent visual language throughout the app
Better accessibility with scalable icons
releases.tagline: A more polished, professional look.

releases.title: AI Symbol Generator
releases.description: Generate lighting symbols using AI and manage public projects more easily.
features: AI-powered symbol generation - describe what you need, get a symbol
New 'Public' project type for shared projects
Project start date defaults to today
Auto-collapse sidebar on tablet screens (768-1024px)
Better error messages for AI service failures
releases.tagline: Let AI help you create lighting symbols.

releases.title: Enhanced Analytics
releases.description: Better tracking of how you use the app to help us improve.
features: Track theme changes, filter usage, and image views
Improved event logging for better insights
Fixed client-safe event logger
releases.tagline: Helping us understand how to improve FOSSAPP.

releases.title: User Management
releases.description: New system for managing users, groups, and permissions.
features: User management system with groups and permissions
Role-based access control
User groups for team organization
Permission management interface
releases.tagline: Control who can do what in FOSSAPP.

releases.title: Viewer Security
releases.description: Enhanced security for the DWG viewer with authentication and rate limiting.
features: Authentication required for viewer access
Rate limiting to prevent abuse
Path sanitization for secure file access
releases.tagline: Your DWG files, protected.

releases.title: Tile Builder UX & DWG Viewer
releases.description: Major improvements to the tile creation experience with mobile-friendly layout and built-in DWG viewer.
features: Built-in DWG Viewer - view generated tiles directly in browser with Autodesk Viewer
Dark/Light mode toggle - switch viewer background to match your preference
Mobile-friendly layout - bucket now scrolls horizontally, tiles stack vertically
Improved drag-and-drop - easier to add products to existing tiles
Touch support - hold-to-drag works on mobile devices
Parallel processing - faster image conversion and Google Drive uploads
releases.tagline: Create and view AutoCAD tiles without leaving your browser.

releases.title: Tile Management System
releases.description: Create AutoCAD DWG tile drawings from product images with professional layouts.
features: Tile Builder at /tiles - drag products into groups, arrange tiles visually
AutoCAD DWG generation - powered by Autodesk APS Design Automation
Google Drive integration - automatic upload to HUB/RESOURCES/TILES/
Add to Bucket button on product pages - build your tile collection as you browse
Real-time progress - watch your DWG being generated with live terminal updates
Professional output - 300dpi images, proper AutoCAD layers, technical specifications
releases.tagline: Generate professional AutoCAD tile drawings in seconds, not hours!

releases.title: Google Drive Integration
releases.description: Projects now integrate with Google Drive for automatic folder organization.
features: Auto-generated project codes (YYMM-NNN format)
Automatic Google Drive folder creation with standard structure
Project version management - create snapshots of your project files
Customer selector - link projects to your customers
Files & Versions tab to manage project documents
releases.tagline: Your project files, organized automatically.

releases.title: Full Project Management
releases.description: Create, edit, and manage your lighting projects with full control.
features: Create new projects with a convenient slide-out form
Edit anything - budget, dates, team members, location
Delete projects safely with confirmation and automatic cleanup
Quick actions menu on the project list for faster workflows
Clickable customer names - jump to customer details with one click
releases.tagline: Manage your lighting projects from start to finish.

releases.title: Dynamic Filter System
releases.description: 18 filters across 6 groups for advanced product search.
features: 18 filters: Supplier, Voltage, Light Source, IP Rating, CCT, and more
Real-time facet counts showing how many products match
Context-aware filtering prevents zero-result dead-ends
Active filter badges with individual clear buttons
URL state persistence for shareable filter links
releases.tagline: Find exactly what you're looking for.

releases.title: Dashboard Fixes
releases.description: Fixed Active Catalogs and Most Active Users showing incorrect data.
features: Active Catalogs now shows the real product counts
Most Active Users actually displays who's been working hard
releases.tagline: Small fixes, big difference when you're trying to understand your data.

releases.title: Security Improvements
releases.description: Automated security checks to keep your data protected.
features: Security scans run before every update
Fixed a potential data vulnerability
releases.tagline: You won't notice anything different, but you're more secure.

releases.title: Authentication Security
releases.description: Important security update for authorized access only.
features: Only logged-in users from your company can access the API
Better protection for your account
More secure login process
releases.tagline: If you're from FOSS, you're all set.

releases.title: Activity Dashboard
releases.description: See who's using FOSSAPP and what pages they're visiting.
features: Activity dashboard shows the most active users this week
See what pages people are visiting
releases.tagline: Great for managers keeping track of team engagement.

releases.title: Color Themes
releases.description: Choose your preferred color theme for a personalized experience.
features: Multiple color themes - Default, Supabase, and Graphite
Switch between themes instantly
Works with both light and dark mode
releases.tagline: Try them all and find your favorite!

releases.title: Animated Logo
releases.description: A little extra sparkle with lighting effects on the logo.
features: Animated logo with lighting effects (glow, shimmer, neon)
Cleaner landing page layout
Better product images
releases.tagline: We're a lighting database, so we added some... light.

releases.title: Faster Deployments
releases.description: Behind the scenes improvements for faster updates.
features: Updates now deploy automatically (less downtime)
Better image galleries for products
Improved product descriptions
releases.tagline: More time building features, less time deploying them.

releases.title: Dark Mode Logos
releases.description: Supplier logos now look great in dark mode.
features: Logos work perfectly in both light and dark themes
No more invisible black logos on black backgrounds
releases.tagline: Your eyes will thank you during late-night project sessions.

releases.title: PWA Support
releases.description: Install FOSSAPP like a native app on any device.
features: Install on your desktop, phone, or tablet
Works offline (interface loads without internet)
Automatic updates in the background
Faster loading after first visit
releases.tagline: Use it like a native app - no more browser tabs!

releases.title: The Beginning
releases.description: The foundation of FOSSAPP - your lighting products database.
features: Search through 56,456+ lighting products
Sign in with your Google account (FOSS users only)
Works great on desktop, tablet, and mobile
Professional database built for lighting designers
releases.tagline: Where it all started!
